title: NW IdolFest 2023 Schedule  Live!
body: Get ready for NW IdolFest 2023! Our schedule is now live! Back for our third year, Northwest IdolFest is a three day convention all about idols, anisong, and j-pop! Featuring your favorite idol performers, vendors, and tons of amazing panels, join us in Seattle, WA from October 20-22, 2023.
